statements: SELECT * FROM consent_forms
SELECT form_id, patient_name, consent_given FROM consent_forms WHERE consent_given = TRUE
SELECT * FROM consent_forms WHERE patient_id = 1001
SELECT form_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM consent_forms ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, consent_valid_until FROM consent_forms WHERE consent_valid_until > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM consent_forms WHERE patient_id = 12345;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM consent_forms WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT form_id, consent_valid_until FROM consent_forms WHERE consent_valid_until > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name FROM consent_forms WHERE consent_valid_until < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM consent_forms WHERE patient_name LIKE '%John%' AND consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM patient_consents;
SELECT patient_name, consent_date FROM patient_consents WHERE consent_type = 'Emergency';
SELECT consent_type FROM patient_consents ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name FROM patient_consents WHERE consent_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT consent_id, patient_name, consent_type FROM patient_consents WHERE patient_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT patient_name, consent_date, consent_type FROM patient_consents WHERE consent_type = 'Medical' ORDER BY consent_date DESC
SELECT * FROM patient_consents WHERE consent_date >= '2022-01-01' AND consent_type IN ('Medical', 'Research') ORDER BY patient_name ASC, consent_date ASC
SELECT patient_name, consent_type, COUNT(*) as total_consents FROM patient_consents GROUP BY patient_name, consent_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_consents DESC
SELECT DISTINCT consent_type FROM patient_consents ORDER BY consent_type
SELECT patient_name, consent_date FROM patient_consents WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY patient_name
SELECT * FROM PatientConsentForms;
SELECT patient_id, consent_date FROM PatientConsentForms WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM HealthcareProviders ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM ComplianceRegulations WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM PatientConsentForms WHERE consent_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PatientConsentForms WHERE consent_given = TRUE;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM HealthcareProviders ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM ComplianceRegulations WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientConsentForms JOIN HealthcareProviders ON PatientConsentForms.patient_id = HealthcareProviders.provider_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_forms WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT form_id, consent_text FROM patient_forms WHERE consent_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT physician_id, specialty FROM physicians ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT * FROM organizations WHERE org_name LIKE '%Health%';
SELECT log_id, action_taken FROM consent_audit WHERE patient_id = 3 ORDER BY audit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_forms ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, form_id, consent_text FROM patient_forms WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM physicians WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT pa.patient_id, pa.consent_date, c.action_taken FROM patient_forms pa JOIN consent_audit c ON pa.form_id = c.form_id;
SELECT o.org_id, o.org_name, p.name FROM organizations o JOIN physicians p ON p.specialty = 'Pediatrics';
SELECT * FROM patient_consents;
SELECT patient_name, dob, email FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT consent_text, consent_version FROM patient_consents WHERE consent_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, speciality FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY speciality DESC;
SELECT patient_name, dob, phone_number FROM patients WHERE dob <= '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_consents;
SELECT patient_name, dob, email FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, speciality FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT consent_text, consent_version, consent_date FROM patient_consents WHERE consent_id = 10;

SELECT provider_name, patient_name FROM healthcare_providers JOIN provider_patient_associations ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = provider_patient_associations.provider_id JOIN patients ON provider_patient_associations.patient_id = patients.patient_id;
